name: copy()
description:
Copies a region of pixels from one image into another. If the source and destination regions aren't the same size, it will automatically resize source pixels to fit the specified target region. No alpha information is used in the process, however if the source image has an alpha channel set, it will be copied as well.

As of release 0149, this function ignores imageMode().
syntax: copy(sx, sy, sw, sh, dx, dy, dw, dh)
copy(src, sx, sy, sw, sh, dx, dy, dw, dh)

parameters.name: sx
parameters.description: X coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameters.name: sy
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameters.name: dx
parameters.description: X coordinate of the destination's upper left corner

parameters.name: dy
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the destination's upper left corner

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: an image variable referring to the source image.
